definition: money-spinning/moneymaking
to breathe/to suck in/to absorb/to inhale
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: China is buying gold at a faster pace than last year.

sentences.english: Forget the criticism about not making money with Android.

sentences.english: The entire state machinery exists to siphon off cash.
sentences.chinese: 整個國家機器就是一臺吸金機器。
